definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Methods Catching by gluing in the cave vicinity and body surface of host's animal.
sentences.chinese: 方法洞穴粘捕法和宿主动物体表检蚤法。

sentences.english: Conclusion We can break the host's specificity of Eperythrozoon.
sentences.chinese: 结论附红细胞体的宿主特异性可被打破。

sentences.english: The clients could easily swallow the cleaner wrasse while it is going about its job.
sentences.chinese: 清洁鱼干活的时候宿主可以轻易地把它吞下去。

sentences.english: Objective To study the snails which transmit parasitic diseases of Angiostrongylus cantonensis in Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解云南省传播广州管圆线虫病的中间宿主螺类。

sentences.english: This fungus victimizes a particular type of cicada found in East Asia, using it as a host in which to propagate.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲，这种菌通过一种特殊的禅作为宿主繁殖。

sentences.english: The bone marrow of the chimerism mice was grafted into the host mice.
sentences.chinese: 最后将该嵌合体小鼠的骨髓移植到宿主体内。

sentences.english: Waterfowl are considered as the important host of influenza A viruses, especially domestic ducks.
sentences.chinese: 水禽被认为是流感病毒的重要宿主，尤其是家鸭。

sentences.english: Herb field mouse (Apodemus uralensis) was removed from plague hosts.
sentences.chinese: 排除了小林姬鼠作为鼠疫宿主的可能。

sentences.english: Interferon is almost always host species-specific in function.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素在功能上通常是宿主种特异性。

sentences.english: They are intermediate hosts of lung flukes.
sentences.chinese: 他们为肺癌吸虫的中间宿主。

sentences.english: Wolbachia's most common manipulation is to interfere in the success of the host's matings .
sentences.chinese: 沃巴赫菌最常用的手段是干扰宿主的交配结果。

sentences.english: Animals can also be infected with T.b. gambiense and act as a reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 动物也可感染布氏冈比亚锥虫并作为储存宿主。

sentences.english: The host-side adapter inherits from the host view of the add-in.
sentences.chinese: 宿主端适配器从外接程序的宿主视图中继承。

sentences.english: The host-side adapter inherits from the host view of the add-in.
sentences.chinese: 宿主端适配器从外接程序的宿主视图中继承。

sentences.english: This finding indicated that the cancers sometimes acquired mitochondria from their hosts.
sentences.chinese: 这个发现表明，肿瘤有时候从其宿主身上获得线粒体。

sentences.english: VP35 interferes with the natural resistance of host cells against viral infections.
sentences.chinese: VP35干扰了宿主细胞对病毒感染的天然抵抗能力。

definition: to live in or on another organism as a parasite/to live by taking advantage of others/parasitism/parasitic
(zoology, medicine) mother's body/(chemistry etc) parent/matrix/(statistics) population/parent population
the young (unborn or newborn) of an animal/larva
